menu.name: Tab Configuration
menu.label: Open Settings
menu.hint: Configure the tabs used to filter chat messages.

settings.hint: You can add, delete, and reorder tabs. Drag the handle to reorder, and click the trash icon to delete.

tooltips.reset: Reset all tab settings to their default state.

reset.title: Reset Settings
reset.content: Are you sure you want to reset all tab settings to their default state? This cannot be undone.

delete.title: Delete Tab
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete the tab '{name}'?
